result.eng: And here comes the man himself.
result.ga: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.orig: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.html: Agus seo chugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.
result.ponchtml: Agus seo ċugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.

result.eng: I saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.orig: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.html: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromthaI saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an seanḟear boċt cromṫaI saw the poor old stooping man.

result.eng: Who is this {man}?
result.ga: Cé hé seo
result.orig: Cé hé seo
result.html: Cé hé seoWho is this {man}?
result.ponchtml: Cé hé seoWho is this {man}?

result.eng: The man with the hat.
result.ga: Fear an hata
result.orig: Fear an hata
result.html: Fear an hataThe man with the hat.
result.ponchtml: Fear an hataThe man with the hat.

result.eng: A man I know.
result.ga: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.orig: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.html: Fear atá ar m'aithneA man I know.
result.ponchtml: Fear atá ar m'aiṫneA man I know.

result.eng: The man with the beard.
result.ga: Fear na féasóige
result.orig: Fear na féasóige
result.html: Fear na féasóigeThe man with the beard.
result.ponchtml: Fear na féasóigeThe man with the beard.

result.eng: Some other man.
result.ga: Fear éigin eile
result.orig: Fear éigin eile
result.html: Fear éigin eileSome other man.
result.ponchtml: Fear éigin eileSome other man.

result.eng: Take my advice and beware of this man!
result.ga: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.orig: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.html: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!
result.ponchtml: Glacaigí mo ċoṁairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!

result.eng: He's a tall man.
result.ga: Is fear ard é
result.orig: Is fear ard é
result.html: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.
result.ponchtml: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.

result.eng: He's a handsome man.
result.ga: Is fear dathúil é
result.orig: Is fear dathúil é
result.html: Is fear dathúil éHe's a handsome man.
result.ponchtml: Is fear daṫúil éHe's a handsome man.

result.eng: She married a rich man.
result.ga: Phós sí fear saibhir
result.orig: Phós sí fear saibhir
result.html: Phós sí fear saibhirShe married a rich man.
result.ponchtml: Ṗós sí fear saiḃirShe married a rich man.

result.eng: She married an old man.
result.ga: Phós sí seanfhear
result.orig: Phós sí seanfhear
result.html: Phós sí seanfhearShe married an old man.
result.ponchtml: Ṗós sí seanḟearShe married an old man.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ga: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.orig: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.html: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ponchtml: Pionta Guinness le do ṫoil - Seo duit - Maiṫ an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}

result.eng: She fell in love with a married man.
result.ga: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.orig: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.html: Thit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: She was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ga: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.orig: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.html: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bochtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ go croí í ag féaċaint ar an duine boċtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: Ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: This is Seán's best man.
result.ga: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le Seán
result.orig: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le Seán
result.html: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le SeánThis is Seán's best man.
result.ponchtml: Seo an fear atá ag seasaṁ le SeánThis is Seán's best man.

result.eng: "Don't do it," the man said.
result.ga: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.orig: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.html: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.

result.eng: That man was only joking.
result.ga: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.orig: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.html: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinnThat man was only joking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ an fear sin aċ ar ẛon grinnThat man was only joking.

result.eng: The man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ga: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.orig: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.html: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anochtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá braon ar bord ag an ḟear anoċtThe man has a drink taken tonight.

result.eng: He is a thouroughly learned man.
result.ga: Tá an léann amach aige
result.orig: Tá an léann amach aige
result.html: Tá an léann amach aigeHe is a thouroughly learned man.
result.ponchtml: Tá an léann amaċ aigeHe is a thouroughly learned man.

result.eng: The man got a college education.
result.ga: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.orig: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.html: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.
result.ponchtml: Fuair an fear foġlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: Wasn't he man enough?
result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.orig: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
result.ponchtml: Naċ raiḃ go leor den ḟear annWasn't he man enough?

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.orig: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.html: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an gar gan an duine boċt a ḃeiṫ istiġIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
